review: *** ******** ** *** ** *** ****** ******* * **** **** **** He is such a humble, kind, ************** experienced n down to earth person that, i feel so satisfied after consulting him for my son. this Dr. is treating my son since 2017, n i feel extremely happy that my son is in safe hands. Thank you.

We are consulting with Dr. Raghuram C.P sir for my ten years old. He is very caring doctor we ever came across. He patiently listens everything what we say and does great counselling. Overall, we always feel that our health (my daughter's) is in good hands. We are very thankful to Dr. Raghuram Sir and to Aster CMI.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: If your child has normal cold and cough, or vaccination then this doctor is OK *** ** *** **** ** ********** ***** *** *************** Let me explain my child case. Since first 3 month after his birth we used to go to him in Rainbow Marathalli and our child is little bit on thinner side. He suffered from cold and cough frequently. His mother told several time about this and doctor after examining his chest give Sinarest AF. Always assure about my baby that she is a smaller weight - everything is OK. But as cold and cough is not reducing we went (just after his visit) to another doctor who gave some blood test to the child by seeing his development and D3 deficiency was enormous. The new specialist with his equipment found child has suffering from ear infection gave antibiotic and advice Tympanometry after 2 month. After doing the test we found even after the medicine the ear infection is still there. Even the new ped found issue in teeth. We are scared if my wife didn't insist and we put our child under this doctor!
My son was diagnosed with ALL B type, *** *** ** ******** ***** ** ******* * They consolidated very well.one thing I can say my son is getting treatment from a very good hand .
Dr. Raghuram isgood doctor cell experience doctor and he will explain all the doubts and problems.good hearted
Dr.Raghuram ,he is very friendly,down to earth,listens to the problems patiently and gives advise in hard times.

review: We were given a time of 4:10pm and were told that maximum we may need to wait 5-10mins.However on reaching there we realised that we had to wait more than 2 hours. Utterly bad service. Management is not proper. They give hollow commitments and assurances and keep you waiting for hours.
